monsters.name: Adranach
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from non-magical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages spoken by its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Arcane Leak
traits.desc: When the adranach is reduced to half its hit point maximum (85 hit points), its mithral mask cracks and its arcane form begins to waver, creating a field of unstable magic around it. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the adranach or enters that area for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) radiant damage. Additionally, if a creature casts a spell within this area, it must make a 14 ability check using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell backfires, consuming the spell slot and dealing 3 (1d6) force damage to the caster for each level of the spell slot that was consumed.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The adranach is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The adranach has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The adranach's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.desc: The adranach counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The adranach makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, one target, reach 5 ft. 32 (4d12 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Force Bolts (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The adranach targets up to four creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6) force damage.

monsters.name: Master Adranach
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from non-magical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: the languages spoken by its creator

traits.name: Arcane Leak
traits.desc: When the adranach is reduced to half its hit point maximum (145 hit points), its mithral mask cracks and its arcane form begins to waver, creating a field of unstable magic around it. Any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the adranach or enters that area for the first time on a turn takes 21 (6d6) radiant damage. Additionally, if a creature casts a spell within this area, it must make a 18 ability check using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell backfires, consuming the spell slot and dealing 7 (2d6) force damage to the caster for each level of the spell slot that was consumed.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The adranach is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The adranach has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The adranach's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Colossal Build
traits.desc: The adranach's carrying capacity is doubled, as is the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Slipstream
traits.desc: The adranach can cast invisibility on itself at will. While it is invisible, its speed is doubled.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the adranach fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The adranach makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, one target, reach 5 ft. 33 (4d12 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, one target, reach 15 ft. 20 (2d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Force Bolts (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The adranach targets up to six creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 35 (10d6) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The adranach makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Vanish (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The adranach casts invisibility and moves up to its walking or flying speed. (This movement doesn't benefit from its Slipstream trait.)

legendary_actions.name: Starry Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: A burst of astral energy flares from the adranach's body. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (5d10) force damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not blinded. The adranach then turns invisible until the start of its next turn or until it makes an attack.

monsters.name: Ashari Firetamer

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Flamecharm (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The firetamer can cast the dominate monster spell (save 15) on a fire elemental or other elemental fire creature. If the creature has 150 or more hit points, it has advantage on the saving throw.

spells: The firetamer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.2nd level (3 slots): flame blade, heat metal, lesser restoration

spells.3rd level (3 slots): daylight, dispel magic, protection from energy

spells.4th level (3 slots): freedom of movement, wall of fire

monsters.name: Ashari Skydancer

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skydancer is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the skydancer instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The skydancer doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Skysail
traits.desc: The skydancer flies with a special Ashari magic item called a skysail|TDCSR {@homebrew |(see page 199)}. While the skysail|TDCSR|skysail's wings are extended, the skydancer can glide through the air at a speed of 60 feet, but must descend by at least 10 feet at the end of its turn and can't gain altitude.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skydancer makes two skysail|TDCSR staff attacks.

actions.name: Skysail Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the skydancer makes this attack while flying, the target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Fly (1/Day)
actions.desc: The skydancer uses its skysail|TDCSR to cast fly on itself for up to 1 minute (no concentration required).

reactions.name: Slow Fall
reactions.desc: When the skydancer takes falling damage, it can reduce the damage by half.

spells: The skydancer is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.2nd level (2 slots): gust of wind, pass without trace

monsters.name: Ashari Stoneguard
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from non-magical attacks, when using skin-to-stone

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stoneguard makes three granite maul attacks.

actions.name: Granite Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the attack hits, the stoneguard can also immediately cast thunderwave as a bonus action. This casting uses a spell slot but requires no components.

reactions.name: Sentinel
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of the stoneguard attacks a target other than the stoneguard, the stoneguard can make one attack against that creature.

spells: The stoneguard is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

monsters.name: Ashari Waverider

traits.name: Healing Tides
traits.desc: Whenever the waverider casts a spell of 1st level or higher that affects a non-hostile creature, that creature regains 3 hit points (in addition to any healing the spell may provide).

traits.name: Marine Empathy
traits.desc: The waverider can speak with and understand aquatic plants and animals.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the waverider or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the waverider. Attacks with this weapon made while underwater do not have disadvantage.

reactions.name: Fishform (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: The waverider can transform into a hunter shark or a giant octopus. Its game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the chosen creature, but the waverider retains its alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. It also retains its skill proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature it transforms into. When the waverider is reduced to 0 hit points, falls unconscious, or dies in this form, it reverts to its humanoid form. It can remain in fishform for up to 3 hours or until it reverts to its humanoid form as a bonus action.

spells: The waverider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): create or destroy water, cure wounds, healing word

spells.3rd level (3 slots): conjure animals (aquatic beasts only), water breathing, water walk

monsters.name: Cinderslag Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from non-magical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Searing Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the elemental takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Molten Form
traits.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be restrained. A creature that starts its turn restrained in this way takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.desc: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Molten Gaze
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 21 (6d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or have one nonmagical item of the elemental's choice that the target is carrying instantly melt or burn to cinders.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The cutthroat deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the cutthroat that isn't incapacitated and the cutthroat doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cutthroat makes two shortsword or dagger attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The cutthroat halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The cutthroat must be able to see the attacker.

traits.name: Intimidating Presence
traits.desc: Whenever the enforcer hits a creature with a melee attack, the target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the enforcer until the end of the target's next turn. The enforcer and its allies have advantage on attack rolls against any creature frightened in this way. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the enforcer's Intimidating Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The enforcer makes three warhammer attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Sense Heat
traits.desc: The cold snap spirit can sense heat within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Frozen Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of a cold snap spirit takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Jealous Spirit
traits.desc: If the spirit attacks a creature that is within 5 feet of another cold snap spirit, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) cold damage on a hit.

actions.name: Consume Warmth
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (6d6) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the end of the spirit's next turn.

actions.name: Subzero Wave (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of the cold snap spirit must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Cyclops Stormcaller

traits.name: One-Eyed
traits.desc: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

traits.name: Storm Wings
traits.desc: While outdoors in stormy conditions, the cyclops has a flying speed of 60 feet.

traits.name: Supernatural Focus
traits.desc: The cyclops has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells, and cannot lose concentration because of turbulent weather.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two ice claw attacks.

actions.name: Ice Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

spells: The cyclops's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The cyclops can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): ice storm, sleet storm, wind wall

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spider makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger; or the spider can make one attack with its web spinner followed by a melee attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 27 (6d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. If this poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Web Spinner
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 40 ft., one target.  The target is pulled 40 feet toward the spider and is grappled (escape 14). The spider can {@action grapple} only one creature at a time in this way. As an action, the spider can cocoon a creature it has grappled in webbing, causing it to be restrained and ending the grappled condition.

reactions.name: Arterial Spray
reactions.desc: When the spider takes damage while below half its hit point maximum, it can spray poisonous blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 (3d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. If this poison damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spiderling can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spiderling ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Searing Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the roc takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The roc sheds bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Inferno (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The roc beats its wings, creating a swirling conflagration. Each creature within 30 feet of the roc must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) fire damage.

monsters.name: Cobalt Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, lightning, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Conductive Body
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage. Instead, its weapon attacks deal an extra 11 (2d10) lightning damage until the end of its next turn. Also until the end of the golem's next turn, any creature that touches it or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two attacks: one with its slam and one with its sword, or it uses its Magnetic Pulse and then its Spinning Cleave.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (3d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spinning Cleave
actions.desc: The golem makes a sword attack against each creature within 10 feet of it.

actions.name: Magnetic Pulse (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The golem raises its arms and unleashes a magnetic pulse. All unattended metal objects within 30 feet of it are pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the golem. Each creature wearing metal armor or made of metal within 30 feet of the golem must succeed on a 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the golem, then fall prone.

monsters.name: Forge Guardian
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the guardian is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The guardian's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Runeblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until it deals damage to the guardian.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 15 feet away from the guardian and knocked prone.

actions.name: Bladestorm (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The guardian makes a Runeblade attack against every creature within 15 feet of it. On a hit, a target is also pushed up to 15 feet away from the guardian and knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Runeblade
legendary_actions.desc: The guardian makes one Runeblade attack.

legendary_actions.name: Kick
legendary_actions.desc: The guardian makes one Kick attack.

legendary_actions.name: Trample (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The guardian moves up to 50 feet without triggering {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}, and can pass through other creature's spaces. Each creature whose space the guardian passes through must make a 23 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. Any creature that shares the guardian's space when it stops this movement is pushed out of its space into the nearest unoccupied space.

monsters.name: Mage Hunter Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 30 ft., passive Perception 15
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.desc: The golem creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 60-foot cone originating from it. At the start of each of its turns, the golem decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to a damage-dealing spell of 4th level or lower, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem uses its Antimagic Jolt and makes two melee attacks, or it makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claw (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or have a magic collar placed upon its neck. While the target wears the collar, it is magically prevented from speaking and cannot cast any spell. A successful 25 Dexterity check using thieves' tools|PHB removes the collar.

actions.name: Antimagic Jolt
actions.desc: Each creature within the golem's Antimagic Cone that has the ability to cast a spell of 1st level or higher must make a 18 Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Platinum Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, cold, fire, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Divine Custodian
traits.desc: When the golem hits a creature with an {@action opportunity attack}, that creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Blast (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The golem emits a burst of radiant light in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in the area must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) radiant damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and is not blinded.

reactions.name: Divine Judgment
reactions.desc: When a creature within 10 feet of the golem makes an attack against a target other than the golem, the golem can make a mace attack against that creature.

monsters.name: Jourrael, the Caedogeist
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, cold, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: Jourrael can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. They take 5 (1d10) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Jourrael deals an extra 35 (10d6) damage when they hit a target with a weapon attack and have advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jourrael that isn't incapacitated and Jourrael doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Inevitable
traits.desc: If Jourrael is reduced to 0 hit points, they do not fall unconscious but becomes an incorporeal spirit for 24 hours. During this time, Jourrael can't return to their original form until they returns to full hit points. In this form, they are invisible, can't attack or interact with corporeal creatures or objects, and can't be targeted by spells. After 24 hours have passed, Jourrael regains 1 hit point and returns to their original form with four levels of exhaustion.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jourrael makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spectral Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Void Dagger
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. 9 (1d4 + 7) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Jourrael adds 5 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker

spells: Jourrael's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Kraghammer Goat-Knight

traits.name: Aura of Protection
traits.desc: Whenever the goat-knight or a creature friendly to it within 10 feet of it makes a saving throw, that creature gains a +2 bonus (included in the goat-knight's saving throws above). The goat-knight must be conscious to grant and gain this bonus.

traits.name: Divine Health
traits.desc: The goat-knight is immune to disease.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The goat-knight has resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against poison.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goat-knight makes two warhammer attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The goat-knight is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): bless, cure wounds, protection from evil and good, sanctuary, shield of faith

spells.2nd level (2 slots): branding smite, find steed (Goat-Knight Steed|TDCSR only), lesser restoration, zone of truth

monsters.name: Magma Landshark
monsters.speed: 50 ft., burrow 50 ft., swim 50 ft. (lava only)
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 120 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Searing Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the landshark takes 11 (2d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The landshark's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The landshark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 45 (6d12 + 6) piercing damage, and 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the landshark. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the landshark, and it takes 42 (12d6) fire damage at the start of each of the landshark's turns.
If the landshark takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the landshark must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the landshark. If the landshark dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.desc: If the landshark jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a 18 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the landshark's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the landshark's space.

actions.name: Lava Pool (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: If the landshark is on solid ground, it melts the area around it, creating a pool of lava in a 10-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 44 (8d10) fire damage.

monsters.name: Young Magma Landshark
monsters.speed: 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., swim 40 ft. (lava only)
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 120 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Searing Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the landshark takes 11 (2d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The landshark's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The landshark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 31 (4d12 + 5) piercing damage, and 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.desc: If the landshark jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the landshark's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the land-shark's space.

monsters.name: Plainscow
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the plainscow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the plainscow can make another attack with its hooves as a bonus action.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Ravager Slaughter Lord

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the Slaughter Lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the Slaughter Lord is wearing no armor and not wielding a shield|PHB, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Slaughter Lord makes four attacks with its dual greatswords or three attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Dual Greatswords
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage if used with both hands to make a melee attack.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The Slaughter Lord makes a spear or dual greatswords attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The Slaughter Lord moves up to half its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Slaughter Lord {@action cast a spell|PHB|casts an innate spell}.

spells: The Slaughter Lord's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): control weather, divine word, fire storm

traits.name: Stabby Frenzy
traits.desc: When the stabby-stabber hits with a melee attack, it can attack again and continue making additional attacks until it misses. The stabby-stabber cannot move between the attacks made with this trait.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Remnant Chosen

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The chosen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Withering Spells
traits.desc: When the chosen casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the next Withered Hand attack it makes before the end of its next turn deals extra damage equal to 1d6 per level of the spell cast.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (5d6) force damage plus extra damage from the Withering Touch trait. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or a wish spell.

spells: The chosen is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch (4d8), dancing lights, mage hand, message, shocking grasp (4d8)

monsters.name: Remnant Cultist

traits.name: Unknowable Secrets
traits.desc: Any attempt to form a mental link with the cultist, cast scry on the cultist, or cast speak with dead on the cultist automatically fails, and the creature that initiated the attempt takes 21 (6d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: One-Eyed
traits.desc: The cultist has disadvantage on any attack roll made against a target more than 30 feet away.

traits.name: Spellsteal
traits.desc: If the cultist successfully uses counterspell to negate another creature's spell, it can cast the countered spell once before the end of its next turn using one of its spell slots of the same level or higher, and requiring no material components.

actions.name: Dagger of Wounding
actions.desc:
Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. Hit points lost to sword of wounding|DMG|this weapon's damage can be regained only through a short or long rest, rather than by regeneration, magic, or any other means.
Once per turn when the cultist hits a creature with an attack using this weapon, it can wound its target. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turns, it takes 2 (1d4) necrotic damage for each time it's been wounded by this weapon. It can then make a 15 Constitution saving throw, ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternatively, the wounded creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make a 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check, ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success.

spells: The remnant cultist is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The cultist has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch (3d8), message, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost (3d8)

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, hideous laughter, mage armor, shield

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the brawler is wearing no armor and wielding no shield|PHB, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The brawler makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the brawler can choose one of the following additional effects:

actions.name: Bruise
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, its speed is reduced by 5 feet until it receives at least 1 point of magical healing. A creature can use its action to make a 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check to heal an affected creature within 5 feet of it (including itself), restoring any lost speed on a success.

actions.name: Disarm
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding. The brawler can choose which item is dropped, and can pick it up.

actions.name: Suplex
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Clever Fighter
reactions.desc: When the brawler hits with an attack or is targeted by an attack, it can add its Intelligence modifier (+2) to its damage rolls or AC until the end of its turn.

reactions.name: Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When the brawler takes damage, it can reduce the damage by 8 (1d12 + 2).

monsters.name: Rivermaw Stormborn

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the stormborn can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stormborn makes two greataxe attacks. If it is concentrating on call lightning, it can also call down a lightning bolt.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

reactions.name: Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
reactions.desc: When the stormborn takes damage, it can reduce the damage by 10 (1d12 + 4).

spells: The stormborn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). The stormborn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur skeleton makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves, or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Flaming Skeleton
monsters.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Heated Weapons
traits.desc: When the skeleton hits with a metal melee weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The skeleton sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage and 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Ignite
actions.desc: The skeleton flings itself at a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 12). On a failed save, the target also takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, even after the {@action grapple} ends. If the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to put out the flames, or if some other effect douses the flames (such as the target being submerged in water), the effect ends.

monsters.name: Vos'skyriss Serpentfolk

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The serpentfolk can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The serpentfolk makes two scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is restrained, and the serpentfolk can't constrict another target.

spells: The serpentfolk's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: animal friendship, speak with animals (snakes only)

monsters.name: Vos'skyriss Serpentfolk Ghost
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.desc: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghost makes two spear attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the ghost makes a ranged attack, its spear rematerializes in its hands after the attack is resolved.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Terrifying Hiss
actions.desc: The ghost emits an uncanny, rasping hiss. Each non-undead creature within 30 feet of the ghost that can hear it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Terrifying Hiss for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the wraithroot tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Wraith Shift
traits.desc: On its turn, the wraithroot tree can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The tree does not provoke {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} while moving, and must finish its movement in a space unoccupied by any Large or larger objects or creatures. Any Medium or smaller creature in the tree's space when it finishes moving is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space of the creature's choice. Medium or smaller objects in the tree's space are pushed to the nearest unoccupied spaces of the tree's choice.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wraithroot tree makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wraithstorm (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The wraithroot tree pulls life energy from the area around it, leaving creatures temporarily frail. Each creature that is not a construct or undead within 30 feet of the tree must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved and gain vulnerability to bludgeoning damage until the end of the tree's next turn.

monsters.name: Grog Strongjaw
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, thunder while enlarged, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while raging
monsters.languages: Common, Dwarvish, Giant, with limited reading and writing

traits.name: Brutal Critical
traits.desc: When Grog scores a critical hit, he rolls double weapon damage dice as usual, then rolls 3 additional weapon damage dice.

traits.name: Feral Instinct
traits.desc: Grog has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Melee Master
traits.desc: Grog can take a −5 penalty to any melee attack roll to gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of his turn, Grog can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

traits.name: Relentless Rage
traits.desc: If Grog is reduced to 0 hit points while raging, he drops to 1 hit point instead if he succeeds on a 10 Constitution saving throw.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Grog wears a belt of dwarvenkind. He wields the Bloodaxe|EGW (a +2 magic weapon), a dwarven thrower, and the Titanstone Knuckles (Exalted)|TDCSR|Titanstone Knuckles {@homebrew |(see page 211)}.

traits.name: Spellbreaker
traits.desc: When Grog damages a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw to maintain its concentration. In addition, Grog has advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet of him.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.desc: Grog has an additional 40 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Grog makes two attacks (three when raging) with his Bloodaxe|EGW, dwarven thrower, or Titanstone Knuckles (Exalted)|TDCSR|Titanstone Knuckles.

actions.name: Bloodaxe|EGW
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (1d12 + 14) slashing damage and 3 (1d6) necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, Grog gains 10 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Dwarven Thrower
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. 24 (2d8 + 15) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Titanstone Knuckles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (1d4 + 12) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Grog casts enlarge/reduce on himself to grow in size for 10 minutes. While enlarged in this way, he has resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage.

reactions.name: Opportunist
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of Grog casts a spell or deals damage to him, Grog can make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

monsters.name: Keyleth, Voice of the Tempest

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Keyleth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Focused
traits.desc: Keyleth has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Keyleth wears a circlet of wisdom|TDCSR (which increases her Wisdom score by 2), +2 leather armor, and a +2 Ring of Protection|TDCSR|ring of protection with a +2 bonus. She wields the Spire of Conflux (Exalted)|TDCSR|Spire of Conflux {@homebrew |(see page 209)}.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.desc: Keyleth casts shapechange to transform into a planetar, an adult bronze dragon, or {@filter another creature of CR 20 or lower that is not a construct or undead|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[0;&20]|type=!construct;!undead|source=null}.

actions.name: Meteor (Earth Elemental Form Only)
actions.desc: When Keyleth falls at least 20 feet, she lands with meteoric force. Each creature within 20 feet of her must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet Keyleth fell. Keyleth still takes falling damage while in earth elemental form.

actions.name: Chain Lightning
actions.desc: Keyleth casts chain lightning (spell save 22) from the Spire of Conflux (Exalted)|TDCSR|Spire of Conflux at a creature she can see within 150 feet of her.

spells: Keyleth is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 22, +14 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, faerie fire, fog cloud, healing word, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): alter self (at will), flaming sphere, gust of wind, pass without trace

spells.4th level (3 slots): blight, control water, grasping vine, polymorph, stone shape

spells.5th level (3 slots): conjure elemental, greater restoration, scrying, wall of stone

spells.6th level (2 slots): heroes' feast, move earth, transport via plants

traits.name: Action Surge (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: Once on his turn, Percy can take one additional action.

traits.name: Cabal's Ruin
traits.desc: Cabal's Ruin (Exalted)|TDCSR|Cabal's Ruin grants Percy advantage on saving throws against spells or magical effects. Additionally, Cabal's Ruin (Exalted)|TDCSR|Cabal's Ruin has 10 charges. When Percy hits with a weapon attack, he can expend up to 10 charges to have the attack deal 1d6 extra lightning damage per charge spent.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Long Rest)
traits.desc: Percy can reroll a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Misfire
traits.desc: When Percy rolls a 2 or lower on the d20 when making an attack with Animus or Bad News, the attack misses and he can't use the weapon again until he spends an action to repair it. On a misfire with Animus, he takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: No Mercy
traits.desc: Percy's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

traits.name: Ranged Master
traits.desc: Percy's ranged weapon attacks have a +2 bonus to hit (included in attacks), ignore half cover and three-quarters cover, and have no range penalty. Additionally, Percy can take a −5 penalty to any ranged attack roll to gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Percy wears a ring of lightning resistance and Cabal's Ruin (Exalted)|TDCSR|Cabal's Ruin {@homebrew |(see page 203)}. He wields Animus and Bad News, which are both +1 weapons.

traits.name: Quick Draw
traits.desc: Percy adds his proficiency bonus to initiative rolls, giving him a +12 to initiative rolls.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.desc: Percy has an additional 40 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Percy makes four ranged attacks with Animus, or two ranged attacks with Bad News. When Percy hits with an attack with either weapon, he can choose one of the following additional effects:

actions.name: Deadeye
actions.desc: Percy gains advantage on his next attack roll this turn made against the same target.

actions.name: Disarm
actions.desc: The target must make a 20 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target drops one item it is holding of Percy's choice.

actions.name: Animus
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +15 to hit, range 320 ft., one target. 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage and 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bad News
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +15 to hit, range 800 ft., one target. 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Absorb Magic (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When Percy is targeted by an enemy's spell, he can absorb a portion of the spell's energy into Cabal's Ruin (Exalted)|TDCSR|Cabal's Ruin. The spell affects him normally, but the cloak gains a number of charges equal to the level of the spell. When he does so, he also gains resistance to one type of damage dealt by the spell until the end of his next turn.

monsters.name: Vex'ahlia
monsters.speed: 30 ft., fly 50 ft. (with {@item broom of flying})
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Elvish, Thieves' Cant, Undercommon

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: During her first turn, Vex has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Vex scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If Vex is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Vex has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Ranged Master
traits.desc: Vex's ranged weapon attacks have a +2 bonus to hit (included in attacks), and ignore half cover and three-quarters cover, and have no range penalty. Additionally, Vex can take a −5 penalty to any ranged attack roll to gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Vex deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Vex that isn't incapacitated and she doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Vex wears +2 Studded White Dragon Leather Armor of Cold Resistance|TDCSR and a +2 ring of protection|TDCSR|ring of protection with a +2 bonus. She carries a broom of flying and a raven's slumber|TDCSR {@homebrew |(see page 197)}, and wields Fenthras (Exalted)|TDCSR|Fenthras {@homebrew |(see page 205)}.

traits.name: Trinket
traits.desc: Trinket|TDCSR moves and acts on Vex's turn, and Vex can use a bonus action to command him to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Dodge}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Attack} action. She can also command him to {@action Attack} as part of her Multiattack action (see below). Trinket|TDCSR can take only one action on each of Vex's turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Vex makes two ranged attacks, and can command Trinket|TDCSR to move up to his speed and use his Multiattack action.

actions.name: Fenthras
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +16 to hit, range 600 ft., one target. 22 (1d8 + 18) piercing damage and 3 (1d6) lightning damage, and Vex can use the following ability:

actions.name: Bramble Shot (2/Short Rest)
actions.desc: The attack deals an extra 18 (4d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be restrained. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: When an attacker that Vex can see hits her with an attack, she takes half damage from the attack.

spells: Vex is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spell-casting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following ranger spells prepared:

spells.2nd level (3 slots): pass without trace, protection from poison

monsters.name: Pike Trickfoot
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: Pike has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Pike wields a mace of disruption and wears gauntlets of ogre power, boots of speed, and the plate of the dawnmartyr (exalted)|TDCSR|Plate of the Dawnmartyr.

traits.name: Dawnmartyr's Grace (1/Long Rest)
traits.desc: When Pike is reduced to 0 hit points while wearing the plate of the dawnmartyr (exalted)|TDCSR|Plate of the Dawnmartyr, she can choose to have a blast of healing flame surround her. She regains 1 hit point and is lifted to her feet. Each enemy within 10 feet of her takes 7 (2d6) fire damage or radiant damage (her choice).

actions.name: Mace of Disruption
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus an extra 7 (2d6) radiant damage if the target is a fiend or an undead. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature becomes frightened of Pike until the end of her next turn.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt (5th Level)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 28 (8d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of Pike's next turn has advantage.

reactions.name: Dawnmartyr's Rebuke
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of Pike hits her with a melee attack, she can deal 7 (2d6) fire or radiant damage to it (her choice).

reactions.name: Everlight's Guidance (3/Short Rest)
reactions.desc: When Pike or a creature she can see within 30 feet of her makes an attack roll, she can grant a +10 bonus to the roll. She can grant this bonus after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

spells: Pike is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame (4d8), spare the dying, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, guiding bolt, healing word, sanctuary, shield of faith

spells.3rd level (3 slots): glyph of warding, mass healing word, protection from energy, revivify, speak with dead

spells.4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement, guardian of faith

spells.5th level (3 slots): flame strike, greater restoration, hallow, mass cure wounds, scrying

monsters.name: Trinket
monsters.languages: understands Common but can't speak it

traits.name: Chosen Companion
traits.desc: Trinket has an additional 10 hit points, and has a +6 bonus to attack and damage rolls and to Wisdom (Perception) checks.

traits.name: Empowered Attacks
traits.desc: Trinket's attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: Trinket has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Raven's Slumber
traits.desc: If Trinket is reduced to 0 hit points and is within 100 feet of Vex, he is immediately drawn into the demiplane within Vex'ahlia|TDCSR|Vex's raven's slumber|TDCSR and stabilized.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Trinket makes two attacks: one with his bite and one with his claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (1d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Scanlan Shorthalt

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: Scanlan has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Focused
traits.desc: Scanlan has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Scanlan wields Mythcarver (Exalted)|TDCSR|Mythcarver {@homebrew |(see page 207)}, wears +2 Studded Leather Armor of Acid Resistance|TDCSR and a +2 ring of protection|TDCSR|ring of protection with a +2 bonus, and carries a hat of disguise and a wand of magic missiles.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.desc: Scanlan has an additional 40 hit points.

actions.name: Mythcarver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage and 3 (1d6) force damage.

reactions.name: Cutting Words
reactions.desc: When a creature Scanlan can see within 60 feet of him makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a damage roll, he can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to roll a d12 and subtract the number rolled from the creature's roll. The creature also has disadvantage on its next saving throw.

spells: Scanlan is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following bard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, minor illusion, vicious mockery

spells.4th level (3 slots): dimension door, polymorph, Otiluke's Resilient Sphere||resilient sphere

spells.5th level (3 slots): bigby's hand||arcane hand, dominate person, modify memory, seeming

spells.7th level (2 slots): Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion||magnificent mansion, reverse gravity

monsters.name: Doty X
monsters.languages: understands the languages that {@creature Taryon Darrington|TDCSR|Tary} speaks

traits.name: Arcane Surge (4/Day)
traits.desc: When Doty hits a target, Taryon Darrington|TDCSR|Tary can channel magical energy to deal an extra 14 (4d6) force damage to the target as long as Taryon Darrington|TDCSR|Tary is not incapacitated.

traits.name: Dedicated Servant
traits.desc: Doty has an additional 20 hit points, and has a +2 modifier to saving throws, ability checks using skill proficiencies, and attack rolls.

traits.name: Limited Vocabulary
traits.desc: Doty can say the following words in Common: "Tary," "Yes," "Correct," "Absolutely," "Soon," and "Handsome."

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: Doty can't be surprised.

actions.name: Empowered Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: Doty regains 15 (2d8 + 6) hit points.

reactions.name: Deflect
reactions.desc: If a creature within 5 feet of Doty that he can see makes an attack against a creature other than Doty, he can impose disadvantage on the attack roll. The attacker then takes 6 (1d4 + 4) force damage.

monsters.name: Taryon Darrington
monsters.speed: 40 ft., fly 50 ft. (with {@item broom of flying})

traits.name: Alchemical Defense
traits.desc: Tary's experimental concoctions have granted him resistance to acid and poison damage, and immunity to the poisoned condition.

traits.name: Doty
traits.desc: Doty X|TDCSR|Doty moves and acts on Tary's turn, and Tary can use a bonus action to command him to use the {@action Dash}, {@action Dodge}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Attack} action. He can also command him to {@action Attack} as part of his Multitask action (see below). Doty can take only one action on each of Tary's turns.

traits.name: Focused
traits.desc: Tary has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Tary wears a helm of brilliance, a robe of useful items, and a ring of the ram. He carries a rod of mercurial form|TDCSR {@homebrew |(see page 197)}, as well as a bag of holding, 1d4 + 4 bead of force||beads of force, a broom of flying, and a chime of opening.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.desc: Tary has an additional 30 hit points.

actions.name: Multitask
actions.desc: Tary makes two weapon attacks or casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, and can also command Doty X|TDCSR|Doty to use his Empowered Fist or Repair action.

actions.name: Mercurial Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bead of Force
actions.desc: Tary throws a bead of force up to 60 feet. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of where the bead landed must succeed on a 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 12 (5d4) force damage. A sphere of transparent force then encloses the area for 1 minute. A creature that fails the save and is completely within the area is trapped inside the sphere.

reactions.name: Brilliant Intellect
reactions.desc: When Tary or another creature he can see within 30 feet of him makes an ability check or a saving throw, he can use his reaction to add +4 to the roll.

spells: Tary is a 15th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

spells.2nd level (3 slots): alter self, branding smite, see invisibility, warding bond

spells.3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fly, haste, magic circle, revivify

monsters.name: Champion of Ravens
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Druidic, Elvish, Thieves' cant

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: During his first turn, the Champion has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Champion scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Aura of Protection
traits.desc: While the Champion is conscious, he and friendly creatures within 10 feet of him have a +3 bonus to saving throws (included above).

traits.name: Eternal Champion
traits.desc: When the Champion is reduced to 0 hit points or dies, his body is destroyed but his spirit returns to the {@deity The Matron of Ravens|Exandria|TDCSR|Raven Queen's} side, and he gains a new body after 1d4 days.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the Champion is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

traits.name: Fate-Touched (4/Day)
traits.desc: When the Champion makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the d20 and use either roll. Alternatively, when a creature the Champion can see makes an attack roll against him, or a saving throw against one of his spells or features, he can force that creature to reroll the attack or save and use the new roll.

traits.name: Shadow Smite (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The Champion deals an extra 49 (14d6) radiant or necrotic damage (his choice) when he hits a target with a weapon attack and he doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Unerring Sight
traits.desc: The Champion's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and have no range penalty.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The Champion wears boots of haste|TDCSR {@homebrew |(see page 194)} and the deathwalker's ward (Exalted)|TDCSR|Deathwalker's Ward {@homebrew |(see page 204)}, and wields Whisper (Exalted)|TDCSR|Whisper {@homebrew |(see page 211)}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Champion makes three attacks with Whisper (Exalted)|TDCSR|Whisper.

actions.name: Whisper
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 10 (1d4 + 8) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the Champion for 1 minute. On a ranged attack, the Champion can teleport with Whisper (Exalted)|TDCSR|Whisper, appearing within 5 feet of the target on a hit, or in a random space within 30 feet of the target on a miss.

actions.name: Touch of Life and Death (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The Champion touches a creature within 5 feet of him, and chooses to either heal or harm that creature, restoring 55 (10d10) hit points or dealing 55 (10d10) necrotic damage. If the creature is an unwilling target, it can avoid either effect with a successful 20 Dexterity saving throw.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The Champion halves the damage that he takes from an attack that hits him. He must be able to see the attacker.

spells: The Champion's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (+10 to hit with spell attacks, save 18). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
